topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5410f3e66368722c062c0000#post_5410f3e66368722c062c0000
You know what? If HSOTD actually had the balls to really exploit its sleazier side it might actually be enjoyable.

Get tits out, ramp up the gore and you'd have a perfectly enjoyable if still stupid and silly little time waster.

That's my general opinion on fanservice in general. I don't mind it if it feels like there is actually some fucking weight behind it, like it actually was trying to do something a bit ballsy.

Girls Bravo is a show that particularly earns my ire. It actually makes nudity boring because it feels like they just stuck the naked ladies in just for the sake of injecting some life into the stale harem comedy formula. It just doesn't feel fun, and nudity that isn't fun is a waste of everyone's goddamn time.

Contrast Kill La Kill which despite having no explicit nudity actually seems to be having a fuck of a lot of fun with its premise and all that goes into it.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

It's just that the fanservice in that show was fucking so stupid you could have just called it porn.

it gets in the way of the actual show cuz one moment Zombie fight next minute HAVE A GIANT PAIR OF TITS!

YOUR A DUDE RIGHT!? YOU LIKE TITS RIGHT!? _*HERE HAVE SOME TITS!!!*_

I wouldn't mind if it wasn't so, Blatant. 

Plus I've mention that one scene in the first episode that killed me.

I mean, I don't mind people liking it but for me it just brings out my inner Pat. basically I'm being a big babby.
